consequences: Neither investigator agrees the claim warrants investigation
One investigator agrees the claim warrants investigation
Both investigators agree the claim warrants investigation

metadata.description: Risky alternatives with objective probability distributions over K=3 investigator agreement outcomes
metadata.design_notes: 30 probability simplexes systematically spanning the K=3 simplex. Groups: near-vertices (R01-R06), edge-concentrated (R07-R12), moderate asymmetry (R13-R18), interior/balanced (R19-R30). All probabilities sum to 1.0.
